summary: Email correspondence between an Assistant United States Attorney and AT&T's legal team regarding a subpoena for a records custodian to testify at a trial starting November 29, 2021, related to AT&T file #227815.001 and an affidavit for purged records.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District Of New York
persons.context: The sender of an email requesting AT&T to identify a records custodian to testify at a trial starting November 29, 2021, and referencing a trial subpoena.

events.title: Trial Start Date
events.description: A trial is scheduled to start on November 29, 2021, for which a records custodian from AT&T is being subpoenaed to testify.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District Of New York

locations: Southern District of New York, 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: An Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York is coordinating with AT&T to secure a records custodian as a trial witness.
The trial in question is set to begin on November 29, 2021.
The communication pertains to AT&T file #227815.001 and an 'Affidavit for purged records'.
AT&T has a dedicated 'Court Appearance Team' within its Global Legal Demand Center handling the request.
